00096 void
00097 GUIViewTraffic::buildViewToolBars(GUIGlChildWindow& v) {
00098     // build coloring tools
00099     {
00100         const std::vector<std::string> &names = gSchemeStorage.getNames();
00101         for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator i = names.begin(); i != names.end(); ++i) {
00102             v.getColoringSchemesCombo().appendItem((*i).c_str());
00103             if ((*i) == myVisualizationSettings->name) {
00104                 v.getColoringSchemesCombo().setCurrentItem(v.getColoringSchemesCombo().getNumItems() - 1);
00105             }
00106         }
00107         v.getColoringSchemesCombo().setNumVisible(5);
00108     }
00109     // for junctions
00110     new FXButton(v.getLocatorPopup(),
00111                  "\tLocate Junction\tLocate a junction within the network.",
00112                  GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_LOCATEJUNCTION), &v, MID_LOCATEJUNCTION,
00113                  ICON_ABOVE_TEXT | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED);
00114     // for edges
00115     new FXButton(v.getLocatorPopup(),
00116                  "\tLocate Street\tLocate a street within the network.",
00117                  GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_LOCATEEDGE), &v, MID_LOCATEEDGE,
00118                  ICON_ABOVE_TEXT | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED);
00119     // for vehicles
00120     new FXButton(v.getLocatorPopup(),
00121                  "\tLocate Vehicle\tLocate a vehicle within the network.",
00122                  GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_LOCATEVEHICLE), &v, MID_LOCATEVEHICLE,
00123                  ICON_ABOVE_TEXT | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED);
00124     // for tls
00125     new FXButton(v.getLocatorPopup(),
00126                  "\tLocate TLS\tLocate a tls within the network.",
00127                  GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_LOCATETLS), &v, MID_LOCATETLS,
00128                  ICON_ABOVE_TEXT | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED);
00129     // for additional stuff
00130     new FXButton(v.getLocatorPopup(),
00131                  "\tLocate Additional\tLocate an additional structure within the network.",
00132                  GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_LOCATEADD), &v, MID_LOCATEADD,
00133                  ICON_ABOVE_TEXT | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED);
00134     // for shapes
00135     new FXButton(v.getLocatorPopup(),
00136                  "\tLocate Shape\tLocate a shape within the network.",
00137                  GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_LOCATESHAPE), &v, MID_LOCATESHAPE,
00138                  ICON_ABOVE_TEXT | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED);
00139 }

00141 
00142 bool
00143 GUIViewTraffic::setColorScheme(const std::string& name) {
00144     if (!gSchemeStorage.contains(name)) {
00145         return false;
00146     }
00147     if (myVisualizationChanger != 0) {
00148         if (myVisualizationChanger->getCurrentScheme() != name) {
00149             myVisualizationChanger->setCurrentScheme(name);
00150         }
00151     }
00152     myVisualizationSettings = &gSchemeStorage.get(name.c_str());
00153     myVisualizationSettings->gaming = myApp->isGaming();
00154     update();
00155     return true;
00156 }

00158 
00159 int
00160 GUIViewTraffic::doPaintGL(int mode, const Boundary& bound) {
00161     // init view settings
00162     glRenderMode(mode);
00163     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00164     glPushMatrix();
00165     glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00166     glDisable(GL_ALPHA_TEST);
00167     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00168     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00169 
00170     // draw decals (if not in grabbing mode)
00171     if (!myUseToolTips) {
00172         drawDecals();
00173         if (myVisualizationSettings->showGrid) {
00174             paintGLGrid();
00175         }
00176     }
00177 
00178     glLineWidth(1);
00179     glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL);
00180     float minB[2];
00181     float maxB[2];
00182     minB[0] = bound.xmin();
00183     minB[1] = bound.ymin();
00184     maxB[0] = bound.xmax();
00185     maxB[1] = bound.ymax();
00186     myVisualizationSettings->scale = m2p(SUMO_const_laneWidth);
00187     glEnable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
00188     glEnable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_LINE);
00189     int hits2 = myGrid->Search(minB, maxB, *myVisualizationSettings);
00190     //
00191     glTranslated(0, 0, -.01);
00192     for (std::map<GUIGlObject*, int>::iterator i = myAdditionallyDrawn.begin(); i != myAdditionallyDrawn.end(); ++i) {
00193         (i->first)->drawGLAdditional(this, *myVisualizationSettings);
00194     }
00195     glTranslated(0, 0, .01);
00196     glPopMatrix();
00197     /*
00198     // draw legends
00199     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00200     glLoadIdentity();
00201     glTranslated(1.-.2, 1.-.5, 0.);
00202     glScaled(.2, .5, 1.);
00203     GUIColoringSchemesMap<GUILaneWrapper> &sm = GUIViewTraffic::getLaneSchemesMap(); //!!!
00204     sm.getColorer(myVisualizationSettings->laneEdgeMode)->drawLegend();
00205     */
00206     return hits2;
00207 }

00228 void
00229 GUIViewTraffic::showViewschemeEditor() {
00230     if (myVisualizationChanger == 0) {
00231         myVisualizationChanger =
00232             new GUIDialog_ViewSettings(
00233             this, myVisualizationSettings,
00234             &myDecals, &myDecalsLock);
00235         myVisualizationChanger->create();
00236     } else {
00237         myVisualizationChanger->setCurrent(myVisualizationSettings);
00238     }
00239     myVisualizationChanger->show();
00240 }

00242 
00243 void
00244 GUIViewTraffic::onGamingClick(Position pos) {
00245     MSTLLogicControl& tlsControl = MSNet::getInstance()->getTLSControl();
00246     const std::vector<MSTrafficLightLogic*> &logics = tlsControl.getAllLogics();
00247     MSTrafficLightLogic* minTll = 0;
00248     SUMOReal minDist = std::numeric_limits<SUMOReal>::infinity();
00249     for (std::vector<MSTrafficLightLogic*>::const_iterator i = logics.begin(); i != logics.end(); ++i) {
00250         // get the logic
00251         MSTrafficLightLogic* tll = (*i);
00252         if (tlsControl.isActive(tll)) {
00253             // get the links
00254             const MSTrafficLightLogic::LaneVector& lanes = tll->getLanesAt(0);
00255             if (lanes.size() > 0) {
00256                 const Position& endPos = lanes[0]->getShape().getEnd();
00257                 if (endPos.distanceTo(pos) < minDist) {
00258                     minDist = endPos.distanceTo(pos);
00259                     minTll = tll;
00260                 }
00261             }
00262         }
00263     }
00264     if (minTll != 0) {
00265         const MSTLLogicControl::TLSLogicVariants& vars = tlsControl.get(minTll->getID());
00266         const std::vector<MSTrafficLightLogic*> logics = vars.getAllLogics();
00267         if (logics.size() > 1) {
00268             MSSimpleTrafficLightLogic* l = (MSSimpleTrafficLightLogic*) logics[0];
00269             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < logics.size() - 1; i++) {
00270                 if (minTll->getProgramID() == logics[i]->getProgramID()) {
00271                     l = (MSSimpleTrafficLightLogic*) logics[i + 1];
00272                     tlsControl.switchTo(minTll->getID(), l->getProgramID());
00273                 }
00274             }
00275             if (l == logics[0]) {
00276                 tlsControl.switchTo(minTll->getID(), l->getProgramID());
00277             }
00278             l->changeStepAndDuration(tlsControl, MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep(), 0, l->getPhase(0).duration);
00279             update();
00280         }
00281     }
00282 }

00285 SUMOTime
00286 GUIViewTraffic::getCurrentTimeStep() const {
00287     return MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep();
00288 }
